website_summaries.verdict: This smooth, sweet vanilla protein powder offers grain-free plant protein to help repair muscles and balance the gut.
pros: Certified organic and non-GMO.One of the few kosher protein powders
cons: A little lower in protein than other powders
Sugar substitute (Erythritol) is disliked by some consumers
Some had problems with the package resealing properly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with new ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I am so so disappointed! This used to be my favorite protein powder. I would go through 1-2 of these a week. But they recently added Erythritol to the ingredients :( It even tastes more artificial. I am really disappointed in the brand for doing so. The original recipe was deliciously perfect! Bring it back please!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product twice now. Both times I ordered both the vanilla and chocolate flavors. Both are great. I have no issue with the actual product. However, the packaging on both needs to be changed. Both pouches in my second order don't reseal. The closure part simply doesn't lock together. If I'm going to spend that much money on a small pouch of protein powder I should be able to reseal it. I will not be ordering again because it's annoying and messy to have to pour the entire pouch into another container. I'll be looking for a replacement brand.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Has That Artificial Cake Mix Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it wouldn't taste like cake mix along with a bad after taste, no such luck. I saw this used on The Kitchen. I'm giving it 2 stars because it does mix smoothly even though the flavor is a big fat 0. I've even tried adding a cup of blueberries to disguise the cake mix flavor, didn't work either. I notice most of the 5 star reviews are older, probably before it was sold to Nestle with a follow up recipe change. I will will check review dates before buying in the future...Buyer Beware. I'm not picky about food at all but still can't get this down easily, very unpleasant flavor.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Bring Back the old
customer_reviews.text: I really looked forward to my morning smoothie. It was perfect. I do not like this new version. I will start trying different brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Contains Erythritol
customer_reviews.text: Product is so sweet because it contains "organic" erythritol. Saying erythritol is organic is like saying gasoline is organic. You should read up about erythritol before you buy this product. I threw mine in the garbage when I read the ingredients label.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard C.

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and full of Protein!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this Organic Plant Protein. I would like to see one made without any "sugar substitute" they use stevia...but I need to get away from all sugar substitutes. My favorite is the Vanilla. Used it in smoothies and in my almond milk with my cereal.
customer_reviews.author: P. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: S-s-s-Stevia!
customer_reviews.text: I'll finish this package, but won't order again- the stevia sweetness is too much for me. Too bad, I like the ingredients otherwise... The texture is fine, and it will probably be fine mixed in with a smoothie or with yogurt. But alone, with water or milk, it's cloying.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn S.

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet and nasty texture
customer_reviews.text: Tastes too much like sweetener--overwhelmingly sweet, in my opinion. The texture is not smooth (although the package says it is). You definitely don't want to let it sit in the liquid for any length of time or it will become a very unpleasant texture. I much prefer the Garden of Life Raw protein powder which is much smoother and less sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Cochran

customer_reviews.title: I love Garden of Life but this product was too gritty ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Garden of Life but this product was too gritty and sweet. It comes with a scoop that was way too much flavorwise. Stevia was used as a sweetener and it is very overpowering. I would return all if I could :( tried all favors and none were good, will stick with my hemp protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaLopez

customer_reviews.title: Not our favorite
customer_reviews.text: We are huge fans of the Garden of Life RAW Organic Protein powder. I was not as impressed with this one. It is MUCH more expensive and there is an unpleasant sweetener (stevia?) flavor. I will stick with the Raw we love.
customer_reviews.author: JSD

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I had an electrolyte abnormality and ended up in the hospital a yr ago. This product was recommended by one of the Drs and I've used it since. I don't like to cook but with this product I know I'm getting good nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia F

customer_reviews.title: Difficult product packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I rated this lower because of the horrible packaging, which makes using it messy, difficult to use and hard to close, and the chalkiness/flem that's left in my throat after drinking it. The taste is good with the vanilla, better than chocolate or coffee.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Woods

customer_reviews.title: Yummy but needs more protein per serving.
customer_reviews.text: The taste and ingredients are awesome (vanilla). It blends really well. My only issue is that each serving only has 15 grams of protein, so it becomes really expensive if you want to use this as a post-workout supplement or even a meal replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Braga

customer_reviews.title: would order again
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't alter the taste to my smoothies which I love. There is no grittiness and blends perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Sugah2Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Did not like taste
customer_reviews.text: It made me feel nauseous. I have had it sitting in my frig, A reminder that I need to dump it.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen gatward

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein powder! I've tried so many that have upset my stomach or tasted badly. This tastes great, blends well and doesn't upset my stomach. The price is higher than some others but it is worth it. I als feel fuller longer then when I do not use a protein add in.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Lots of protein for only 100 calories!
customer_reviews.text: You get a great amount of protein here for a really low calorie intake. After trying all of the flavors the vanilla is by far my favorite on its own and blends best into a smoothie. As other reviewers noted it isn't very sweet, but even being someone who enjoys sweets I still think this protein has a very palatable taste. I've been very please with this protein powder!
customer_reviews.author: lizinvt

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A great vegan product worth spending my money on!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Love the taste and the nutrition is clean, wholesome and spot on! Finally, a vegan product that has everything I had been looking for! Yummy! My favorites are the smooth vanilla and smooth energy!
customer_reviews.author: C. Guy

customer_reviews.title: ... as much as other brands and the taste is good.
customer_reviews.text: Personally I feel that the price is a bit high when compared to similar products but you don't need as much as other brands and the taste is good.
customer_reviews.author: John Falto

customer_reviews.title: Unsettling
customer_reviews.text: Have not tried it because the box had been opened and taped shut again and the bag inside had a hole in it...not impressed ..
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Delicious protein powder.
customer_reviews.text: I use protein powder in my smoothies but have problems with ingredients in many of the protein powders on the market. This product does not have those ingredients and tastes wonderful!! I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Snodgrass

customer_reviews.title: The best ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff I have ever found for a person like me who is allergic to everything! Tastes awesome! Smooth. Mixes well with a shaker mix.
customer_reviews.author: susan Cook

customer_reviews.title: This was the brand she recommended for my protein shakes
customer_reviews.text: I work with a nutrionist due to stomach issues. This was the brand she recommended for my protein shakes. Use this protein powder everyday with berries,almond milk, coconut water, almond butter and ice. Love them!!!! NO more coffee for me just protein shakes.....
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: tasty
customer_reviews.text: hard to find a tasty protein powder, but I really like this one. it does have a cinnamon flavor. it is not overpowering, but you should like a hint of cinnamon if you order this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I buy this protein weekly and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite protein powder to use in my morning smoothie. It blends well and adds to the flavor rather then leaving an aftertaste or gritty texture.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: I like that it mixes well with water
customer_reviews.text: I like that it mixes well with water, and tastes decent enough that dosesn't have to be blended with fruit if youre on the go......... It also has probiotics in it which is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, be sure not to mix in with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, be sure not to mix in with green smoothies. Goes great with a milk based smoothie. Milk, banana, and Garden of Life Vanilla Organic Plant Protein and your all set!
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: too little and too pricey
customer_reviews.text: If this is what it takes for my body not to reject it then it's too expensive for the small packaging. That's the only reason why I didn't give it a 5 stars but overall the taste of it was good. Whether I drank it with water or soymilk and some fruit, it tasted wonderful and helped me stay full for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Salguero

customer_reviews.title: Taste Like Cake Batter! Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It was recommended by my herbalist because I am a vegetarian and need to supplement my protein intake. This tastes like cake batter to me. Not too sweet at all. So delicious!
customer_reviews.author: N. Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Yummy! Just too expensive for the amount.
customer_reviews.text: Love how it has no grains! The taste was yummy! However, it's too expensive for such a little bag; therefore, we won't be continuing to buy it consistently.
customer_reviews.author: dsanchez

customer_reviews.title: Change the sweeteners
customer_reviews.text: I would for sure give this a 5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ If it was only sweetened with stevia. Why did they change the sweeteners and put Erythritol in it??? 🙈
customer_reviews.author: Joni H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend enjoys using this. She likes to add it to her shakes
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This powder is a little more gritty than some others I've used, and the taste is just "okay." I like the Designs for Health Paleo Cleanse powder better, as far as taste, amount of grit, and the beneficial things in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: GREAT way to get more protein in your diet.
customer_reviews.text: I love to add a scoop to my smoothies. Doesn't have much taste when paired with a almond or coconut milk. Would recommend Smooth Protein and Energy.
customer_reviews.author: cece0824

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product...amazing in just water or to sweeten a smoothie! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alieon07

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: NOT GRITTY and PLANT-BASED! YES! I have this on auto-ship
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wurzel

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, not gritty
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive about trying plant protein (in the past, it did not turn out well), however this one is really good! I just use unsweetened vanilla almond milk, and it’s awesome...not gritty at all! I only wish it came in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting protein powder at the best price!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this protein powder in my morning smoothie. I quit eating high carb cereal. Much to my surprise after 3 months I lost 8 pounds without doing anything else. I love this protein powder!
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I didn't not like this protein powder. It has a griddy taste.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Price

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The best tasting vegan protein out there. The taste is great, ingredients make you happy about your selection and MUCH cheaper than at stores like Whole Foods!
customer_reviews.author: KateF

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looking for something without estrogen and I think this is it..
customer_reviews.author: Carole Converse-Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find a protein powder that is not whey and no after taste. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy McCammon

customer_reviews.title: ... a protein to your shakes this plant protein is good for people who need to limit their protein intake--much ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are adding a protein to your shakes this plant protein is good for people who need to limit their protein intake--much healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Francine R. Deal

customer_reviews.title: So great, I use it every day!
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting, sugar free (sweetened with stevia - not bitter tasting!) vegan and is a great source of protein. I put it in my smoothies every day.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very grainy and does not taste very good. Had a few people try it and none liked it
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Gfriend did research and found that this is better & healthier
customer_reviews.text: Tasty. Gfriend did research and found that this is better & healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Cutrone III

customer_reviews.title: and because I liked the idea of getting both protein and fiber at ...
customer_reviews.text: I find the Stevia aftertaste to be a bit much for me, but I was pleasantly surprised by the rich vanilla flavor. I bought this as an occasional alternative to my whey protein to get more plant-based nutrition in my diet, and because I liked the idea of getting both protein and fiber at the same time. I don't know if I will buy it again, but it was much cheaper on Amazon than in my local store so it was worth a shot. It tastes good with my unsweetened Almond Coconut Blend milk so I'll finish the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Have been using this product since it came out in ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product since it came out in the health food stores. I put it in smoothies and in almond milk. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The stevia makes it taste like a diet product. No more for me after this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great Shake
customer_reviews.text: Great for in the am when I'm a hurry good tasting too!!
customer_reviews.author: jbruce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, can add any fruit or berry if you don't like plain vanilla!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy F. Wright

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder, great tasting and blends perfectly! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I actually love this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this protein powder!!! But, the value isn't there for us. We use protein powder every day for our family and so we need it in bulk. If I could buy this in more volume with about 1/2 or even more of the price reduced, it would totally get my full five stars. It is just not econimical for our family.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Added to my smoothy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Added to my smoothy, I felt better overall. Felt satisfied and didn't havr brain fog, its loaded with good nutritional stuff. My brain felt sharper.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite non-animal protein. It's the best and I feel great after having it.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, love drinking a good tasting cold healthy breakfast
customer_reviews.author: Happy buyer

customer_reviews.title: best plant protein ever
customer_reviews.text: best plant protein ever , highly recommended , gentle on GIT , tastes good , easily swallowed and not heavy
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Much more creamy and much less granular than other protein powders- Just the right touch of sweetness!
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder is delicious! Much more creamy and much less granular than other protein powders- Just the right touch of sweetness!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I usually add fruit and ice and it's pretty close to going to the ice cream shop
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the smoothest protein shake I have ever used and I have used them for years off and on. You can make this just in a shaker and it's still smooth! It also has an authentic taste (unlike others I have tried!). I usually add fruit and ice and it's pretty close to going to the ice cream shop! I would highly recommend. It is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: C Fogg

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is good I mixed with water or coconut milk
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is good I mixed with water or coconut milk, a touch of OJ, and fruit and Greek yogurt. Thought it was a little gritty because it still settled to bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Grain Free Protein
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure I'd find a grain free protein that has drinkable flavor. Vanilla okay, dissolves okay, and 10 grams of a "complete" protein is more than sufficient. Low on the fiber. In a smoothie, added fruit makes up for the lack of fiber. My 4-star rating, after taste of stevia unfortunate and a little on the sweet side. Still found it to be the best grain-free protein supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name-is PRIVATE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting, helped build my husband backup after serious illness, He still insists on having it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Inez S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: great tasting product with lots of nutrients. Great addition to my fruit and veggie shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this product is a great buy and exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the smoothness and the flavor better than any others ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the smoothness and the flavor better than any others that I've used. It makes my smoothies taste even better.
customer_reviews.author: Betty DeVore

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day to make my morning shake. I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: natalie dorf

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this protein powder. It is by far the best tasting organic plant protein I have found. I only wish it was less expensive as I use it everyday
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good non-dairy protein powder for my smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: i really like this protein powder. No dairy in it, and it's pretty fillling. Tastes fine. I'm on my third or fourth bag.
customer_reviews.author: Geek Freak

customer_reviews.title: This tastes horrible. I enjoy plant protein powders
customer_reviews.text: This tastes horrible. I enjoy plant protein powders, but not this one. The best I've found so far is Perfect Plant Protein. It's organic and tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: TOO SWEET!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because the reviews were so great and the ingredients were fantastic for my lifestyle. It is sooooo incredibly sweet though. I'm going to purchase super greens to add to it because I can't even drink it it's that's sweet.
customer_reviews.author: tomatobean

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting. Not chalky.
customer_reviews.text: I literally tested 20 different protein powders before doing a month long elimination diet. This was hands down the best tasting and most versatile for my needs. I could add sweet or savory to create a breakfast or dinner smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Nothing "smooth" about it
customer_reviews.text: I wish I liked this more. It is horribly chalky and gives me gut rot.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. H

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor. Blends pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor. Blends pretty well. Digests easily. Works well for me since I am lactose intolerant and want to avoid gluten and soy. I enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is one the of best protein power I have very used
customer_reviews.text: This is one the of best protein power I have very used! The taste is great and not gritty.
customer_reviews.author: kbfghbcfh

customer_reviews.title: Good but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. But it is a little expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Lani Tanaka

customer_reviews.title: worst tasting ever!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be just what I"m looking for. But once I tried it I realized I had made a terrible mistake. Not only does this taste terrible, the consistency is disgusting. I've tried a lot of protein powders in the past and this is the worst tasting I've ever had. The rest of the package is going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: William P. McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Plant protein
customer_reviews.text: Plant protein is not for me. Wanted to see if I would like it but nope. Very unpleasant taste. I'll stick to my whey protein!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Schorr

customer_reviews.title: Used to be amazing, but now formulation is chalky.
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this protein powder, delicious and smooth. I have smoothies near daily due to a very restrictive diet. This is the only protein powder I can have. Unfortunately, it seems they changed the recipe. I have several bags delivered every month. Last months delivery was different. I was pleased the seal on the bag was improved (it actually seals), but my smoothies taste powdery, chalky now. I'm incredibly disappointed. I wish I had been notified as I now have 6 bags of this. That is a lot of money to waste so I'm using it anyways, but it's not good. I wish they would back to how it was! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Looooo Loooooo

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor (Vanilla), no side effects on AIP protocol.
customer_reviews.text: I like this vegetable protein the best out of most of the proteins out there for as close to AIP as I can get for gluten and dairy free. The only issue is the price is quite high. I found it being the best price here on Amazon, but you always need to shop around for this one as sometimes it's offered less in other locations. It seems with my restrictive protocol there are many cost factors I have to evaluate prior to buying. It's a necessity, and I have to always watch pricing on these items.
customer_reviews.author: Georgi Matusewicz

customer_reviews.title: Really yummy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand I have seen that doesn't have a single one of my 6 true food allergies or 55 food sensitivities. I've been using the smooth energy, and it's good too, but not as tasty as the vanilla. I use two servings, as this is my breakfast, and 1/4 avocado for creaminess and body (allergic to nuts and dairy), along with some frozen blueberries, raw honey and 10 ounces of Smart water. Really good! Thanks to Garden of Life for making a protein powder I can have!
customer_reviews.author: amarieTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great plant protein
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent if you're sensitive to dairy, gluten and grains, blends well with a little fresh fruit, low in calories compared to other protein powders, and no belly bloat. I use this every morning, but you do need to drink as soon as you make it, because it will get thick and clumpy if you let it sit too long.
customer_reviews.author: Ingalls26

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder tastes great with some sort of "milk" (like unsweetened almond milk) and a packet of Truvia/stevia. I've tried samples of the chocolate and coffee flavor, and those are very palatable as well. If I don't supplement with a protein powder, then I probably am not getting my ideal amount of grams of protein based on my weight/gender. The only con---it seems that this bag of 9 oz. of protein runs out really quickly, and it's not inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I really like the way the taste
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way the taste, I sometime add a little chocolate extends with it to give it a different flavor almond milk and banana is enough to make a breakfast and lunch smoothly. Some days i mix in grounded flax seed. This will be my 3rd time ordering it is a bit pricy but I like the taste with no bloated feeling of drinking this and it really keep me satified until my next meal
customer_reviews.author: Sandra A

customer_reviews.title: My husband says this is the best tasting protein powder he has ever tasted
customer_reviews.text: My husband says this is the best tasting protein powder he has ever tasted, specifically in the vanilla, although the chocolate is good too. And the best part is, it has none of the fillers or gluten that normally upsets his stomach with other protein powders.
customer_reviews.author: Blrm77

customer_reviews.title: Lactose free, mainly grit free!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had issues with protein, being that I just found out I'm lactose intolerant. So this helps a lot. I mainly use it for cooking, gives me an extra kick in my banana pancakes. It is a little gritty, but nothing I can't manage. (By little, I mean very little.) If you use almond milk with it, it tastes amazing! Def a great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Felecia

customer_reviews.title: So yummy!!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Have been adding to a green veggie smoothie with some Vanilla collagen powder. It’s soooo delicious, and not grainy or that weird powder taste. Dissolves completely from what I can tell (haven’t added it to a pure liquid like juice or water). Will definitely repurchase
customer_reviews.author: A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Protein Mix Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have tasted a few on the market all with that yucky texture all not tasting very good etc. This yes this the best f*****g stuff ever on the market and I mean the best. Get some you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for teen on low carb, high fat, no sugar diet
customer_reviews.text: Dr put kid on diet, kid hates new food, kid loves this. Awesome. THanks!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wick

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best tasting plant protein powders I've tried. I normally like the chocolate but in this one the vanilla had the better flavor. Only thing that disappoints is that it can't be purchased in a larger container.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great when mixed with almond milk.
customer_reviews.text: This mix actually dissolves - with a little patience. Don't try it in water though - yuk! In almond milk it tastes fine. I like to use it because of the plant base proteins. Cost per serving is consistent with others of lesser quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years and love it. Mix it in daily with my smoothie. always satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent meal replacement or helps with curbing sweet tooth!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for a meal replacement. Taste is great!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Young

customer_reviews.title: I loved the idea of vegan
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of vegan, organic protein shake mix but the only thing that I don't like is the sweetness of it, it contains stevia extract, otherwise the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein Powder on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best!! Tastes delicious, makes me feel great and my nails have grown longer and stronger than I have EVER see them, since I starting taking it! Fan for life!
customer_reviews.author: jenigirl83

customer_reviews.title: No! Pass!
customer_reviews.text: Nope, I don't care what the others reviews say...stevia aftertaste is horrible! Pass! Even my son wouldn't drink this.
customer_reviews.author: K. B. P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. No more upset tummy from whey. I mix this with water or almond milk, throw in some blueberries or almond butter or a sweet potato.
customer_reviews.author: KHenry

customer_reviews.title: Best pea protein I’ve had over 7 years
customer_reviews.text: Immediately blends with my insistence on thicker shakes. Ingredients are straight forward and grain free! Finally!!
customer_reviews.author: The New Mexican

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: this has a really great taste, but is very expensive for the amount you get. It is slightly grainy, but not overly vanilla-y or fake sweet tasting. Overall a wonderful product and a good substitute for whey- and soy-based proteins.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Fake
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed. The Vanilla flavor tastes so artificial. I was forcing myself to drink the smoothie that I used it in but it was so nasty I just couldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Beyonca

product_meta.title: Garden of Life Organic Protein Powder - Vegan Plant-Based Protein Powder, Vanilla, 9.4 oz (265g) Powder
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Vanilla| Size:10 Servings (Pack of 1)Organic plant protein is a certified USDA organic and non-GMO project verified plant protein supplement that is different to any other protein in the garden of life line. Organic plant protein is uniquely formulated to have superior taste and texture, ideal for anyone looking for a clean protein supplement that is free of common allergens such as gluten, grains, dairy and soy.
feature_bullets: GRAIN FREE DRINK: This high-quality and clean protein drink has 15 grams of a complete plant-based amino acid profile for ideal growth, muscle building, and tissue repair
SMOOTH PROTEIN POWDER: Unique blend of seven nutritious plant proteins from organic pea seed, organic flaxseed, organic cranberry seed, organic chia seed and organic pumpkin seed
VITAMINS AND MINERALS: This delicious vanilla protein powder includes 19 naturally occurring vitamins and minerals
PROTEIN POWDER WITH PROBIOTICS: Tasty, 100 calorie, smooth protein shake with 1 Billion CFU probiotics and 12 enzymes for easy digestion
VEGAN PROTEIN POWDER: Organic, kosher, gluten free, dairy free, soy free, non-GMO plant protein with no artificial or chemical ingredients and <1 gram of sugar

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
